import sys
from math import floor

def main():
    # Read from stdin
    X, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

    # Calculate number of grams of sand in the upper bulb after t seconds
    upper_bulb = X - floor(t/2)

    # Print result
    print(upper_bulb)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
#!/usr/bin/python3

import sys
from math import floor

# Read from stdin
X, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

# Calculate number of grams of sand in upper bulb after t seconds.
upper_bulb = X - floor(t/2)

# Print result
print(upper_bulb)

import sys

#input
x, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())

#calc
if t <= x - t: #正の整数なら
    ans = x - 2*t #2次元問題に帰着できる
else:
    ans = 2*t - x

#output

print(ans)

import sys

#input
x, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())

#calculation
if t <= x:
    ans = x - t
else:
    ans = 0

#output
print(ans)

import sys

#input
x, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())

#calc
if t <= x - t: # x - 2t >= 0
    ans = x - 2*t # x - 2t
else:
    ans = 0

#output
print(ans)

import sys

import sys

# input
x, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())

# calculation
if t >= x:
    ans = 0
else:
    ans = x - t

# output
print(ans)
